descriptions:
Welcome to the repository of my digital self...
Here I comment on and share what I find surfing the internet [scroll down and use 'filter content' above]
Here I publish original content under a Creative Commons license [see top menu bar]
From here I syndicate this content to various social networks [currently: FB]
Internal hashtags for facilitated navigation: #words #watchthis #readme #think #discuss
an open repository for my digital self
